name: Crazy Chicken VR Blast
summary: Get your trigger fingers ready, because Crazy Chicken VR Blast takes the chaotic, chicken-blasting action to a whole new dimension! Dive into the crazy world of the iconic Moorhuhn/Crazy Chicken franchise, now fully reimagined for VR, and experience the ultimate test of speed, accuracy, and just how much fun it is to shoot at zany, unpredictable chickens!
